verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3198>don't<s%> rebuke me in your <S%H7110>wrath,<s%> neither <S%H3256>chasten<s%> me in your hot <S%H2534>displeasure.<s%>
For your <S%H2671>arrows<s%> have <S%H5181>pierced<s%> <S%H3027>me,<s%> your hand presses hard on <S%H5181>me.<s%>

There is no <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> neither is there any <S%H7965>health<s%> in my <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of my <S%H2403>sin.<s%>
For my <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> have gone <S%H5674>over<s%> my <S%H7218>head.<s%> As a <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H4853>burden,<s%> they are too heavy for <S%H3515>me.<s%>
My <S%H2250>wounds<s%> are <S%H887>loathsome<s%> and <S%H4743>corrupt,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of my <S%H200>foolishness.<s%>
I am <S%H5753>pained<s%> and bowed <S%H7817>down<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%> I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6937>mourning<s%> all day <S%H3117>long.<s%>
For my <S%H3689>waist<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7033>burning.<s%> There is no <S%H4974>soundness<s%> in my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
I am <S%H6313>faint<s%> and <S%H3966>severely<s%> <S%H1794>bruised.<s%> I have <S%H7580>groaned<s%> by reason of the <S%H5100>anguish<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
<S%H136>Lord,<s%> all my <S%H8378>desire<s%> is before <S%H585>you.<s%> My groaning is not hidden from <S%H5641>you.<s%>
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5503>throbs.<s%> My <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H5800>fails<s%> <S%H216>me.<s%> As for the light of my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H1992>it<s%> has also left <S%H369>me.<s%>
My <S%H157>lovers<s%> and my <S%H7453>friends<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> aloof <S%H5048>from<s%> my <S%H5061>plague.<s%> My <S%H7138>kinsmen<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> far <S%H7350>away.<s%>

They also who <S%H1245>seek<s%> after my <S%H5315>life<s%> lay <S%H5367>snares.<s%> Those who <S%H1875>seek<s%> my <S%H7451>hurt<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> mischievous <S%H1942>things,<s%> and <S%H1897>meditate<s%> <S%H4820>deceits<s%> all day <S%H3117>long.<s%>
But <S%H2795>I,<s%> as a deaf <S%H8085>man,<s%> don't hear. I am as a mute <S%H483>man<s%> who <S%H6605>doesn't<s%> open his <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
<S%H376>Yes,<s%> I am as a man who <S%H8085>doesn't<s%> hear, in whose <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are no <S%H8433>reproofs.<s%>
For in <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, do I <S%H3176>hope.<s%> You will <S%H6030>answer,<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>
For I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8055>"Don't<s%> let them gloat over <S%H1431>me,<s%> or exalt themselves over me when my <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H4131>slips.<s%>"
For I am <S%H3559>ready<s%> to <S%H6761>fall.<s%> My <S%H4341>pain<s%> is continually before <S%H8548>me.<s%>
For I will <S%H5046>declare<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%> I will be <S%H1672>sorry<s%> for my <S%H2403>sin.<s%>
But my <S%H341>enemies<s%> are <S%H2416>vigorous<s%> and <S%H6105>many.<s%> Those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> me without <S%H8267>reason<s%> are <S%H7231>numerous.<s%>
They who also <S%H7999>render<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%> are <S%H7853>adversaries<s%> to <S%H7291>me,<s%> because I follow what is <S%H2896>good.<s%>
<S%H5800>Don't<s%> forsake <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh. My <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7368>don't<s%> be far from me.
<S%H2363>Hurry<s%> to <S%H5833>help<s%> <S%H136>me,<s%> Lord, my <S%H8668>salvation.<s%>
